title: I just got placed in low priority queues despite me not leaving a single game
body: Good system Riot. Keep it up

One of those, as Riot Tantram has already stated, is moving your champion around simply to avoid getting automatically kicked from the match. If you run around in circles doing absolutely nothing useful, sure you will avoid the automatic kick, but you don't avoid Leaverbuster.
